data.title: Slightly Stoopid Concert Setlist: Discover the Average Song List
data.meta_description: Explore the average setlist of a Slightly Stoopid concert. Get insights into their most played songs, fan favorites, and unique live performances. Perfect for fans preparing for their next show!
data.text:
Slightly Stoopid are an American rock band fronted by Miles Doughty and Kyle McDonald, completed by a rotating set of versatile musicians throughout the years. Formed in 1994 by then-high-schoolers Doughty, McDonald and past drummer Adam Bausch, the group was signed by Sublime frontman Bradley Nowell to his label, Skunk Records. With their impeccable fusion of rock, reggae, acoustic soul, hip hop, heavy metal and punk rock, Slightly Stoopid have carved out a new space for themselves within the music industry. Now a seven-piece ensemble, Slightly Stoopid’s musical melting pot has captured the ears of listeners around the world. With their malleable sound, Slightly Stoopid have found success in regularly collaborating with fellow artists such as Sublime with Rome, SOJA and G. Love & Special Sauce. The band has toured extensively throughout the United States and Europe and has headlined many festivals including Bumbershoot and Lollapalooza.

Below, find all the details you need to know ahead of the Slightly Dirty Summer Tour, how to score Slightly Stoopid tickets via Ticketmaster, a sneak peek at their average setlist and more.

Slightly Stoopid Concert Setlist Info

Known for their awe inspiring visuals, musical dexterity and engaging presence, Slightly Stoopid’s live performances are not to be missed. Providing fans with hours of phenomenal music, the atmosphere at a Slightly Stoopid show is one meant for grooving. With their complex full band arrangements, Slightly Stoopid offers audiences an immersive sound experience, allowing them to bask in the colorful fusion of punk and reggae for an evening.

Below, find an average setlist from Slightly Stoopid’s Slightly Dirty Summer Tour.

Slightly Stoopid’s Slightly Dirty Summer Tour Setlist:

Bandelero

Officer

If You Want It

Good Life

If You See Me Smiling

Anywhere I Go

2 AM

Franklin’s Tower (Grateful Dead cover)

Got Me on the Run

Waiting

Hands High (Chali 2na & Krafty Kuts cover)

Hold It Down

Sweet Honey

Up on a Plane

No Cocaine

Collie Man

If This World Were Mine

Closer to the Sun

Source: Setlist.fm.

Slightly Stoopid Tour Stats

Current Tour: Slightly Dirty Summer Tour

Set time: During Slightly Stoopid’s Slightly Dirty Summer Tour, door times vary, opening between 5:30 p.m. and 7:30 p.m., with Slightly Stoopid taking the stage an hour and a half after the opener(s) finish playing.

Length of average Slightly Stoopid show: 1 hour, 30 minutes
